text: Lingareddypalem is a village in Krishna District of Andhra Pradesh, India. It is located at a distance of 110 km from Vijayawada and 50 km from Machilipatnam. == Education == There are two schools in Lingareddypalem. One is Zilla parishad high school and the second one is R.C.M school. Category:Villages in Krishna district
title: Lingareddypalem
